short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start a WhatsApp chat without saving to Contacts. Simply select the phone number and right-click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat instantly in WhatsApp Web or WhatsApp Desktop.

Easily set a keyboard shortcut or customize defaults by clicking the Options link.

For your privacy and security, this Google Chrome extension requires no special permissions to install or use.
